thread.title: Wash your dishes and eat for free at these Dubai restaurants
thread.title_full: Wash your dishes and eat for free at these Dubai restaurants

title: Wash your dishes and eat for free at these Dubai restaurants
text:
Wash your dishes and eat for free at these Dubai restaurants Staff Reporter /Dubai Filed on February 23, 2017 | Last updated on February 23, 2017 at 12.33 pm Share 
(Supplied photo) The best things in life are free. and delicious Dubai Food Festival is starting on Thursday and it's catering to every single Dubai resident. From February 23 to March 11 th , residents can indulge themselves in amazing food selections throughout the city. What's even more interesting is that some locations will be having promotions so you make the most out of the festival. One fine example of which is THE BEACH's quirky campaign for the frequent foodies out there, and it's pretty simple. From February 23 rd to March 11 th , THE BEACH by Meraas is celebrating Dubai Food Festival this year by giving their guests a pleasant surprise at the end of their meal, offering them the opportunity to walk away without paying their bill! Instead, guests at the popular sea side destination who spend Dh300 or more at a variety of F&B outlets, will be invited to 'wash their bill clean' in the kitchen, and by doing so, earning their meal for free! The 'Wash Your Bill Clean' concept will run across 6 restaurants at The Beach between 23rd February and 11th March and a different winner will be chosen each day throughout the Food Festival, giving them chance to eat for free by simply getting their hands wet! Winners will be chosen at random and will be notified at the end of their meal. Participating restaurants include:
